FAQ.TITLE: You still have questions?
FAQ.SUBTITLE: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart.

CONTACT.TEL: Call us anytime for a quick solution
CONTACT.EMAIL: Send us an email to solve your problem

MEDIA.FOLLOW_SEQUENCE: Follow the steps in the specified order

ONBOARDING.INTRO_TEXT: Please provide your information and preferences to get started.
ONBOARDING.GEOLOCATION_DESCRIPTION: Allow the application to access your location to provide personalized services.
ONBOARDING.NOTIFICATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Receive important updates and alerts from the application.
ONBOARDING.PRIVACY_POLICY_REQUIRED: You must accept the privacy policy to continue
ONBOARDING.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION_1_CONTENT: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.
ONBOARDING.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION_2_CONTENT: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect via the Application includes: Personal Data: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, that you voluntarily give to us when you choose to participate in various activities related to the Application. Derivative Data: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Application, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the Application. Geo-Location Information: We may request access or permission to track location-based information from your mobile device, either continuously or while you are using the Application, to provide location-based services. If you wish to change our access or permissions, you may do so in your device's settings. Mobile Device Access: We may request access or permission to certain features from your mobile device, including your mobile device's notifications and other features. If you wish to change our access or permissions, you may do so in your device's settings.
ONBOARDING.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION_3_CONTENT: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the Application to: Create and manage your account. Deliver targeted advertising, coupons, and promotions to you. Email you regarding your account or order. Enable user-to-user communications. Fulfill and manage purchases, orders, payments, and other transactions related to the Application. Generate a personal profile about you to make future visits to the Application more personalized. Increase the efficiency and operation of the Application. Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience with the Application. Notify you of updates to the Application. Offer new products, services, and/or recommendations to you. Perform other business activities as needed. Request feedback and contact you about your use of the Application. Resolve disputes and troubleshoot problems. Respond to product and customer service requests. Send you a newsletter.
ONBOARDING.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION_4_CONTENT: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows: By Law or to Protect Rights: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation. Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance. Marketing Communications: With your consent, or with an opportunity for you to withdraw consent, we may share your information with third parties for marketing purposes, as permitted by law.
ONBOARDING.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION_5_CONTENT: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse. Any information disclosed online is vulnerable to interception and misuse by unauthorized parties. Therefore, we cannot guarantee complete security if you provide personal information.
ONBOARDING.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION_6_CONTENT: If you have questions or comments about this privacy policy, please contact us at: support@example.com

GPS.SUBTITLE: Use these apps to guide you to your destination

BOOKING.CONFIRMATION: Your booking request has been sent. You will be contacted shortly for confirmation.

PARKING.TITLE: Parking
PARKING.SUBTITLE: Available parking options for your stay

NO_SPOTS.TITLE: No parking spots available
NO_SPOTS.MESSAGE: There are currently no parking spots available for this property.

RESERVATION.CONFIRMATION: Reservation request sent! You will receive a confirmation shortly.

SPOT1.NAME: Residence Underground Parking
SPOT1.DESCRIPTION: Secure underground parking with badge access. Reserved and numbered spot, with surveillance cameras.

SPOT2.NAME: Residence Outdoor Parking
SPOT2.DESCRIPTION: Outdoor parking within the residence compound, guarded by security. Numbered spots.

SPOT3.NAME: Public Parking
SPOT3.DESCRIPTION: Public parking available on the street adjacent to the residence. Not guarded, spots not guaranteed based on availability.

NO_RULES.TITLE: No Rules Available
NO_RULES.MESSAGE: No house rules have been defined for this property yet.

NOTES.TITLE: Important Note
NOTES.DESCRIPTION:
Please respect these rules during your stay to ensure a pleasant experience for everyone.
If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact the reception at any time.

CHECK_IN_OUT.TITLE: Check-in and Check-out Times
CHECK_IN_OUT.DESCRIPTION: Check-in between 3PM and 8PM. Check-out before 11AM. Please inform us in advance for late arrivals.

BREAKFAST.TITLE: Breakfast
BREAKFAST.DESCRIPTION:
Breakfast is served from 7AM to 10AM in the dining room.
If you need an earlier breakfast, please let us know the day before.
Vegetarian and gluten-free options are available upon request.

WIFI.TITLE: Wi-Fi
WIFI.DESCRIPTION:
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.
The network name and password are available at reception and in your room information booklet.

QUIET_HOURS.TITLE: Quiet Hours
QUIET_HOURS.DESCRIPTION: Please maintain quiet hours between 10PM and 8AM for the comfort of all residents.

NON_SMOKING.TITLE: No Smoking Policy
NON_SMOKING.DESCRIPTION: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the property. Designated smoking areas are available outside.

PET_POLICY.TITLE: Pet Policy
PET_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Pets are allowed with prior approval. Additional fees may apply.

TRASH.TITLE: Waste Management
TRASH.DESCRIPTION: Please sort your waste and dispose of it in the appropriate containers located outside the building.

ROOM_CLEANING.TITLE: Room Cleaning
ROOM_CLEANING.DESCRIPTION:
Cleaning service is available daily between 10AM and 2PM.
Please use the 'Do Not Disturb' sign if you do not wish to be disturbed.
Additional cleaning can be requested for an extra fee.

NO_PARTIES.TITLE: No Parties
NO_PARTIES.DESCRIPTION: Parties and loud events are not allowed without prior authorization.

FIRE_SAFETY.TITLE: Fire Safety
FIRE_SAFETY.DESCRIPTION: Please familiarize yourself with emergency exits and fire extinguisher locations. Never leave lit candles unattended.

EMERGENCY_EXITS.TITLE: Emergency Exits
EMERGENCY_EXITS.DESCRIPTION:
Evacuation plans are posted on your room door.
In case of emergency, follow staff instructions and proceed to the indicated exits.
The assembly point is located in the main garden.

POOL_RULES.TITLE: Pool Rules
POOL_RULES.DESCRIPTION: The pool is open from 9AM to 8PM. Children must be supervised at all times. Shower is mandatory before entering the water.

LATE_ARRIVAL.TITLE: Late Arrival Instructions
LATE_ARRIVAL.SUBTITLE: Follow these instructions if you arrive outside standard check-in hours
LATE_ARRIVAL.NO_INSTRUCTIONS: No late arrival instructions are available for this property. Please contact the owner for more information.
